posts.post_content:
Posted By: Josh Wulkan
All:

Just a quick note to let you know that Huggins and Scott's September Masterpiece Auction is now live. There are several graded Old Judge's, T's, regionals and loads of other impressive vintage sports, non-sports and Americana Collectibles.

Simply go to the website:

www.hugginsandscott.com

You can browse the lots without registering, but if you happen to see anything you'd like to bid on, by all means, create a user id and password and begin bidding. If you have already registered with us, please use the user id and password that you previously created. If you don't know if you registered, or don't remember your user id or password, please call or email us and we'll be happy to help you.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to give us a call or send us an email.

Thanks and I think most of you will find atleast something you're looking for.

Josh Wulkan
Huggins and Scott Auctions
1-866-462-2273
email: auction@hugginsandscott.com
